title: Realistic hands/arms for all 3 weapons + improved shotgun & pistol models

requirements.text: Ensure visible first-person hands and arms are rendered for all three weapons (pistol, shotgun, and assault rifle) in WeaponViewModel.tsx. The hands and arms must be anatomically positioned to convincingly grip each weapon, matching the weapon's hold style (one-handed grip for pistol, two-handed pump grip for shotgun, two-handed rifle grip for assault rifle).

quotes: bei allen 3 waffen soll man h√§nde und arm sehen die die waffe halten

acceptanceCriteria: Pistol view model shows a right hand gripping the pistol handle and a partially visible forearm
Shotgun view model shows both hands on the shotgun (trigger hand and pump hand) with visible forearms
Assault rifle view model retains existing hands/arms and they remain correctly positioned
Hand and arm geometry is visible in first-person perspective during idle, aim, fire, and reload states
Skin-toned mesh is used consistently across all three weapons

requirements.text: Redesign the shotgun view model in WeaponViewModel.tsx to be significantly more realistic. The model should include a recognizable pump-action shotgun silhouette with a distinct pump forend, barrel, receiver body, stock, and trigger guard using appropriately shaped and sized Three.js geometries.

quotes: modelliere die shotgun und pistole auch realistischer

acceptanceCriteria: Shotgun has a long cylindrical barrel
Shotgun has a distinct pump forend (sliding grip section under the barrel)
Shotgun has a visible receiver/body block
Shotgun has a stock extending toward the camera
Shotgun has a trigger guard detail
Overall proportions match a real-world pump-action shotgun (e.g., Mossberg 500 style)

requirements.text: Redesign the pistol view model in WeaponViewModel.tsx to be significantly more realistic. The model should include a recognizable semi-automatic pistol silhouette with a distinct slide, barrel, frame/grip, trigger guard, and magazine base using appropriately shaped Three.js geometries.

quotes: modelliere die shotgun und pistole auch realistischer

acceptanceCriteria: Pistol has a rectangular slide on top
Pistol has a short barrel protruding from the slide
Pistol has a frame and grip handle angled downward
Pistol has a visible trigger guard
Pistol has a magazine base visible at the bottom of the grip
Overall proportions match a real-world semi-automatic pistol (e.g., Glock-style)

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
All weapon and hand/arm geometry must remain within WeaponViewModel.tsx using Three.js/React Three Fiber primitives
Do not alter weapon stat configs in frontend/src/types/weapon.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useWeaponSystem.ts
Upgrade tier glow overlays and recoil/reload animations must continue to work after model changes
nonGoals: Adding new weapons beyond the existing three
Changing weapon gameplay stats (damage, fire rate, ammo)
Importing external 3D model files (GLB/GLTF); use procedural Three.js geometry only
Changing enemy, environment, or HUD components
